ContinuousBIT_Filter

Continuous Built-In Test flags for filter information

Bits 64-95 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

Constants
RESPONSE_OFFSET

The offset of the 0 position of the value represented by this object in the overall BIT response Value: 64 bits

GENERAL_FLAGS

Bitmask for general filter flags (bits 64-71)

GENERAL_FLAGS

0xFF000000 - Bitmask for general filter flags (bits 64-71)

Note

This mask is shifted 64 bits to the right from the original 128 bitmask to have a 0 index at bit 64

Functions
flags
uint32 flags() const

Gets the value of the filter flags (bits 64-95)

Returns
uint32

Value of the filter flags

ContinuousBIT_Filter
ContinuousBIT_Filter() = default

explicit ContinuousBIT_Filter(
const uint32 bits
) : Bitfield(bits)

bits
const uint32

Value of bits 64-95 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags
